RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntRangeAttribute

RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntRangeAttribute Class Reference

#include <optionintrangeattribute.h>

Inheritance diagram for RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntRangeAttribute:

[legend]
Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntRangeAttribute:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

An option storing a signed int value beetween a range.

It is used with the OptionManager and may be added to an OptionButton.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntRangeAttribute::OptionIntRangeAttribute ( const char *  name,
int  min,
int  max 
)

The base constructor.

It constructs an option beetween the min and the max range with a step of 1. The initial value is set to 0.

Parameters:
name The name of the option attribute
min The min range
max the max range

int  min,
int  max,
unsigned int  step 
)

The step-defined constructor.

It constructs an option beetween the min and the max range with a defined step.The initial value is set to 0.

Parameters:

bool RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntRangeAttribute::setValueStr ( const char *  c  )  [virtual]

Set the value of the attribute.

If the value is out of range, the value is not changed and a warning log is sent

Parameters:
c The new value
Returns:
always true

void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::setType ( tOptionAttributeType  t  )  [inherited]

Set the type of the attribute.

Set OptionAttribute::type to t. If the type is OAT_UNKNOWN, a warning log message is sent to the Logger.

void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::setName ( const char *  n  )  [inherited]

Set the name of the attribute.

Logs a warning message if the name is empty. The control of the lenght of the string is done by std::strlen.

const char * RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::getToolTip (  )  [inherited]

Get the tooltip text of the attribute.

The name can contains space and other specials character but keep in mind this is used as the label of the option (in LauncherOptions dialog).

FXObject* RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::widget [protected, inherited]

The widget linked to this attribute.
